footer.slogan: Boost your TikTok career with gaming and live streaming experts

hero.title: Your TikTok Gaming & Live Partner
hero.subtitle: Discover how we transform gaming and live streaming passion into successful careers

story.title: Our Story
story.content1: Founded in April 2024, FreshAgency was born from a unique vision: that of a creator understanding the daily challenges of the TikTok community. As an official TikTok partner, we stand out through our personalized approach to managing and optimizing gaming and live streaming accounts.
story.content2: Our mission goes beyond talent management. We are committed to transforming our creators' passion into viable careers, focusing on training, personalized support, and revenue maximization, particularly in live streaming. Our specific expertise in gaming and lives allows us to offer tailored support, adapted to each creator's unique needs.
story.content3: At FreshAgency, we're not just an agency - we're a dynamic community where every creator finds their place. Our commitment to excellence and deep understanding of the TikTok ecosystem enable us to guide our talents toward success while maintaining the highest standards of security and professionalism.

hero.title: Contact Us
hero.subtitle: Our team is here to answer all your questions

questions.question: Is it paid?
questions.answer: No, it's completely free. There is no financial link between the agency and creators, they keep 100% of their revenue.

questions.question: Do you have access to my account?
questions.answer: No, we can only see your live statistics, we have no control over your account.

questions.question: Can I change my mind?
questions.answer: Yes, you can leave at any time and quit the program if you wish.

questions.question: Where can I contact you?
